name: Digital Dreams: Fragmented Memories
description:
Made for Godot Wild Jam 55 theme Dreams.

Wild cards used: Kaboom, lightly used as bosses will explode on death. Disassemble, abstractly used as you disassemble and reassemble on death.

Welcome to Digital Dreams: Fragmented Memories. This is yet another game where my ambitions beat my abilities and I was not able to add everything I had hoped. The inspirations for this game were the Gameboy Zelda games and Tron. It was more difficult than I imagined making fun and interesting puzzles so the game is a lot shorter than I had hoped. Either way I hope you enjoy it!

Do not worry about dying not progress is lost. You will be disassembled and re-assembled back to the rooms checkpoint. 

Controls:

WASD - Move

Arrow Keys - Shoot

Q - Bomb (once unlocked)- Can destroy some walls.

E - Backup (once unlocked) - Sets a backup marker. Pressing the key again instantly returns you to the backup.

M - Mute audio.
